ArtRescape http://ArtRescape.com- Facebook http://www.facebook.com/ArtRescape- Twitter http://twitter.com/ArtRescapeâ¶ Main Features- Exclusive Widgets: Clock, Memo, Calendar, Contact, Switch and Search Bar - Gestures: Simple Use with Finching, Double Touching, Sliding, Long Touching. - Smart Folder: Available adding folders on All apps and Home screen, flexible size - Dock bar: Available putting max 20 apps on the dock bar, Emotional Filter Effect, Various Screen Switching, Opacity Adjustment- Multi Wallpaper : Offering various wallpapers in one package, min 3 to max 24- Available for Changes by Setting Point Color Changes: Available for Color Changes for widgets, Menu, Guide, or icons  - Live Background: Changes to dull backgrounds with dynamic backgrounds- Wide-Range Theme Support: Wide-range theme support by Atom Launcher and also existing SSKIN and GO Launcher themesâ¶ Features- High quality : Launcher for Ice Cream Sandwich / Jellybean (from Android ICS/JB 4.0.2) - reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: I think the Atom themes are the most beautiful themes for any launcher. Almost every theme I see I love, with other launcher themes I have to sort through tons of them to find a couple that are just okay. They\'re launchers are so unique and I believe what people are really looking for...  Gorgeous themes that cater to the individual,  not the same theme everyone has on their android.  Love them!!!
reviews.author: Erica Joan
